mapper.select: select b_rid, b_rcontent, b_ref_bid, b_rwriter, b_create_date, b_modify_date, b_status form b_reply r, board b where r.b_ref_bid = b.bid and b_rid = #{ b_rid} order by b_rid
select * from b_reply where b_rid = #{ b_rid }
mapper.insert: insert into b_reply values (seq_brid.nextval, #{ b_rcontent }, #{ b_ref_bid }, #{ b_rwriter }, sysdate, sysdate, default)
mapper.update: update b_reply set b_rcontent = #{ b_rcontent }, b_modify_date = sysdate where b_rid = #{ b_rid }
update b_reply set b_status = 'N', b_modify_date = sysdate where b_rid = #{ b_rid }
